description.zh-cn: 东汉末年至三国时期曹魏名将。以善守能攻著称，在江陵之战和樊城之战中表现出色。曹魏建立后，官至大司马，封陈侯。
description.en: A military general serving under the warlord Cao Cao during the late Eastern Han dynasty and later in the state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period. He was known for his capabilities in both offense and defense, particularly in the Battle of Jiangling and the Battle of Fancheng. After the establishment of Cao Wei, he reached the rank of Grand Marshal and was enfeoffed as Marquis of Chen.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏的奠基者。
description.en: A warlord who rose to great power during the late Eastern Han dynasty and was the founder of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期由曹丕建立的政权。
description.en: A state founded by Cao Pi during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继西汉之后的统一王朝。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Western Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 古代官职，为最高军事长官之一。
description.en: An ancient official title, one of the highest military commanders.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁因功获封的侯爵爵位。
description.en: A marquis title granted to Cao Ren for his merits.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁与曹纯的父亲，曾任侍中、长水校尉。
description.en: Father of Cao Ren and Cao Chun, who served as Palace Attendant and Colonel of Changshui.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁的同母弟，曹魏将领。
description.en: The full younger brother of Cao Ren, a general of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁之子，官至镇东将军。
description.en: Son of Cao Ren, who served as General Who Guards the East.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁之子，封为列侯。
description.en: Son of Cao Ren, enfeoffed as a marquis.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁之子，封为列侯。
description.en: Son of Cao Ren, enfeoffed as a marquis.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁的祖父，曾任颍川太守。
description.en: Grandfather of Cao Ren, who served as the Administrator of Yingchuan.

description.zh-cn: 曹泰之子，曹仁的孙子。
description.en: Son of Cao Tai and grandson of Cao Ren.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁的出生地，位于沛国，今安徽省亳州市。
description.en: Cao Ren's birthplace, located in Pei State, modern-day Bozhou, Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 赤壁之战后，曹仁与周瑜、刘备联军为争夺南郡而进行的一场长达近一年的战役。
description.en: Following the Battle of Red Cliffs, a nearly year-long campaign between Cao Ren and the allied forces of Zhou Yu and Liu Bei for control of Nan Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 关羽北伐期间围攻曹仁所守的樊城，曹仁死守直至徐晃援军到来，最终击退关羽。
description.en: During Guan Yu's northern expedition, he besieged Fancheng, which was defended by Cao Ren. Cao Ren held the city until reinforcements led by Xu Huang arrived, ultimately repelling Guan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕伐吴期间的一场战役，曹仁在此战中被东吴将领朱桓击败。
description.en: A battle during Cao Pi's invasion of Wu, in which Cao Ren was defeated by the Eastern Wu general Zhu Huan.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年孙策、孙权麾下的重要将领。
description.en: An important general serving under Sun Ce and Sun Quan during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的开国皇帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 刘备麾下的重要将领，以勇武著称。
description.en: An important general under Liu Bei, known for his bravery and martial prowess.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下的重要将领。
description.en: An important general serving under Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期东吴将领。
description.en: A military general of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年在宛城发动叛乱的人物。
description.en: A figure who started a rebellion in Wan city during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁的部曲将领。
description.en: A subordinate military officer under Cao Ren.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁的长史（高级幕僚）。
description.en: Cao Ren's Changshi (Chief Clerk or senior staff officer).

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的将领和官员。
description.en: A general and official of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年及三国时期的军阀和将领，后归顺刘备。
description.en: A warlord and general during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period, who later served Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操讨伐马超、韩遂等关中联军的战役。
description.en: A battle in which Cao Cao campaigned against a coalition of warlords from the Guanzhong region, including Ma Chao and Han Sui.

description.zh-cn: 曹操平定河北后围攻壶关的战役。
description.en: The battle where Cao Cao besieged Hukou Pass after pacifying Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏的第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下的重要将领，曹魏的开国元勋。
description.en: An important general under Cao Cao and a founding father of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操麾下的重要谋士。
description.en: An important advisor to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 古代高级军事将领的官职，地位仅次于大将军。
description.en: An ancient high-ranking military title, second only to the Grand General.

description.zh-cn: 古代高级军事将领的官职，通常负责南方战区的军事行动。
description.en: An ancient high-ranking military title, usually responsible for military operations in the southern theater.

description.zh-cn: 古代最高军事统帅的官职之一。
description.en: One of the titles for the supreme military commander in ancient times.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁的姐夫，孝灵宋皇后之兄。
description.en: Cao Ren's brother-in-law, brother of Empress Song of Emperor Ling.

description.zh-cn: 汉灵帝的皇后，宋奇的妹妹。
description.en: Empress of Emperor Ling of Han, sister of Song Qi.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁是曹操麾下的重要将领，长期为其效力。
description.en: Cao Ren was a key general under Cao Cao, serving him for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕即位后，曹仁继续为其效力，并被任命为车骑将军、大将军、大司马等高级职务。
description.en: After Cao Pi ascended the throne, Cao Ren continued to serve him and was appointed to high-ranking positions such as General of Chariots and Cavalry, Grand General, and Grand Marshal.

description.zh-cn: 曹炽是曹仁的父亲。
description.en: Cao Chi was Cao Ren's father.

description.zh-cn: 曹纯是曹仁的同母弟。
description.en: Cao Chun was Cao Ren's full younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 曹泰是曹仁的儿子。
description.en: Cao Tai was Cao Ren's son.

description.zh-cn: 曹楷是曹仁的儿子。
description.en: Cao Kai was Cao Ren's son.

description.zh-cn: 曹范是曹仁的儿子。
description.en: Cao Fan was Cao Ren's son.

description.zh-cn: 曹初是曹泰的儿子。
description.en: Cao Chu was Cao Tai's son.

description.zh-cn: 曹褒是曹炽的父亲，即曹仁的祖父。
description.en: Cao Bao was Cao Chi's father, making him Cao Ren's grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁是曹操的族弟。
description.en: Cao Ren was a younger clan cousin of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 宋奇的妻子是曹仁的姐姐，故宋奇是曹仁的姐夫。
description.en: Song Qi's wife was Cao Ren's older sister, making Song Qi his brother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 孝灵宋皇后是宋奇的妹妹。
description.en: Empress Song of Emperor Ling was Song Qi's younger sister.

description.zh-cn: 在江陵之战中，周瑜率领吴军与曹仁的军队交战近一年，最终攻克南郡。
description.en: In the Battle of Jiangling, Zhou Yu led the Wu army against Cao Ren's forces for nearly a year, ultimately conquering Nan Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 在樊城之战中，关羽率军北伐并围困曹仁于樊城。
description.en: In the Battle of Fancheng, Guan Yu led his army on a northern expedition and besieged Cao Ren in Fancheng.

description.zh-cn: 在濡须之战中，朱桓击败了曹仁的进攻，导致曹仁战败。
description.en: In the Battle of Ruxu (222-223), Zhu Huan defeated Cao Ren's attack, leading to Cao Ren's defeat.

description.zh-cn: 在江陵之战中，牛金作为曹仁的部曲将领出战。
description.en: During the Battle of Jiangling, Niu Jin fought as a subordinate officer under Cao Ren.

description.zh-cn: 在江陵之战中，陈矫担任曹仁的长史。
description.en: During the Battle of Jiangling, Chen Jiao served as Cao Ren's Chief Clerk.

description.zh-cn: 在樊城之战中，徐晃率领援军与曹仁内外夹击，共同击退了关羽。
description.en: In the Battle of Fancheng, Xu Huang led reinforcements to coordinate with Cao Ren from both inside and outside the siege, jointly repelling Guan Yu.

description.zh-cn: 在樊城之战的危急时刻，满宠劝谏曹仁坚守城池，对稳定军心起到了重要作用。
description.en: During the critical moments of the Battle of Fancheng, Man Chong advised Cao Ren to firmly defend the city, playing a crucial role in stabilizing the morale of the troops.

description.zh-cn: 在围攻壶关时，曹仁向曹操进言，建议对守军围三缺一，以开其生路，曹操采纳了此计，最终使守军投降。
description.en: During the siege of Hukou Pass, Cao Ren advised Cao Cao to leave one side of the siege open to provide an escape route for the defenders. Cao Cao adopted this strategy, which led to the defenders' surrender.

description.zh-cn: 青龙元年，魏明帝曹叡因曹仁、夏侯惇、程昱等人的功绩，下诏将他们配享曹操庙庭。
description.en: In the first year of the Qinglong era (233), Emperor Ming of Wei, Cao Rui, issued an edict to honor Cao Ren, Xiahou Dun, Cheng Yu, and others for their merits by having their spirit tablets placed in Cao Cao's ancestral temple.

description.zh-cn: 樊城之战最终以关羽撤退告终，其北伐战略目标未能实现。
description.en: The Battle of Fancheng ended with Guan Yu's retreat, and his strategic objective for the northern expedition was not achieved.

description.zh-cn: 经过近一年的战斗，曹仁最终未能守住江陵，南郡被周瑜攻克。
description.en: After nearly a year of fighting, Cao Ren ultimately failed to defend Jiangling, and Nan Commandery was conquered by Zhou Yu.

description.zh-cn: 曹仁在濡须之战中被东吴将领朱桓击败，战后不久便因病去世。
description.en: Cao Ren was defeated by the Eastern Wu general Zhu Huan in the Battle of Ruxu (222-223) and died of illness shortly after.
